channel.title: Making the product accessible and WCAG compliant
channel.description:
We had a couple of potential customers asking us for the: - [Voluntary Product Accessibility Template](https://www.section508.gov/sell/vpat) (VPAT) - or how compliant we are with [Web Content Accessibility Guidelines](https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG21/) (WCAG).
I'm curious - how many people out there went through the process of making their product accessible and have a VPAT that they can present to their customers?
What was the process like? Do you just go down the list of items in WCAG and check them off?

item.title: Making the product accessible and WCAG compliant
item.dc:creator: SteveMcLeod
item.description:
Hmmm, no answer here.

I recommend you find a forum for web accessibility and ask again. Here’s one that might be helpful and seems to be active: https://webaim.org/discussion/

It’d be great if you brought back any helpful info to this discussion!
